page.title: 06SANDY MARKET
page.content: THERE IS A MARKET EVERY FRIDAY AND IT IS A VERY BUSY MARKET. IT IS HELD IN THE CAR PARK BEHIND THE SUPERMARKET. WE DID TWO SURVEYS IN THE MARKET. THE 1ST SURVEY WAS TO FIND OUT WHERE THE PEOPLE WHO SHOP IN THE MARKET COME FROM AND THE 2ND WAS TO FIND OUT WHAT STALLS ARE IN THE MARKET. MANY PEOPLE IN THE MARKET COME FROM SANDY BUT A LOT OF PEOPLE COME FROM THE SURROUNDING VILLAGES. THERE WERE SOME PEOPLE WHO HAD COME FROM COVENTRY. THERE ARE LOTS OF STALLS AND IT WAS VERY COLOURFUL. LOTS OF THE STALLS SOLD CLOTHES. YOU CAN ALSO BUY FRUIT, VEGETABLES, MEAT, FISH, SHOES, TOYS, RECORDS, JEWELLERY AND CARDS. THE REASONS PEOPLE USE THE MARKET ARE BECAUSE IT IS CHEAPER, THERE IS LOTS OF VARIETY AND YOUCAN WALK AROUND LOOKING AT THE STALLS.
